overview: Eli Singer is the Co-founder and Chairman of the Board for WebCollage. Prior to WebCollage Eli worked for Memco Software, Inc. where Eli founded Memco’s North American business, directed the company’s sales and marketing activities, grew revenues from zero to more than $50 Million in just four years and oversaw its successful IPO. He led Memco’s growth from a small startup to one of the largest information security software companies in the world until its acquisition by Platinum Technology in 1999. Prior to joining Memco in 1995, Eli served five years as a senior IT consultant for major Wall Street banks.
